Author: MuddyWalruss
Text: I'm the exact same with the hair thing. It's falling out a lot more than when i was at my worst and i don't know why. Like i'm gaining weight, not losing, so why is it falling out even more?

Author: tigerchik
Text: unfortunately those are all very normal symptoms when recovering - your body has to adjust to more food. Try digestive enzymes. Your stomach shrinks when restricting, which adds to the awfulness of feeling full easily. Hair reflects nutritional status from a couple months ago etc etc.
